name: Running Man Stress Race
description:
I have been a fan of Running Man show for 4 years :) With this app, i'm trying to bring you it's experience.

Every member of Running Man will test you with 4 tough challenges - base on his character.

1. Ji Sukjin - Reverse World: The Big Nose Brother believe that in a Reverse World, he would be the Mightest One :D His 4 challenges are: Right Is Wrong, Reverse Gravity, Egg's Home and Music Catch

2. HaHa - Kid's Play: Of course, HaHa wants play kid games: Pirate Stab, Snail Kawi Bawi Bo, Number Chain and Lego Tower

3. Lee Kwang Soo - Giraffe: Do you have Giraffe Instict? Prove it through: Flap Giraffe, Giraffe Jump, Eggs Smash and Find Differences

... and more races are waiting for you to explore

P/S: the app will be updated - and would be better by time
